Name: Find You
About the game: Find You is a puzzle-platformer in which your goal is to unite every character to make it to the next level. But everyone is controlled by the same input, which leads them to move simultaneously. So you have to find a way to stop one, in order for the others to catch up to him. Of course it gets a bit more complex than that after a few levels ;) Many different types of characters, objects and mechanics to give you a hard time beating this game.
